casebody.data:
No. 824,

Misc.

Kent v. United States. Myron G. Ehrlich and Richard Arens for petitioner. Solicitor General Cox for the United States.

C. A. D. C. Cir. Motion of Elyce Zenoff Ferster et al. for leave to file a brief, as amici cuñae, granted. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of cer-tiorari granted. Case transferred to appellate docket.
